verses.verse: (For the choir director; according to Jeduthun. A Psalm of David.) My <S%H5315>soul<s%> [waits] in <S%H1747>silence<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H389>only;<s%> From Him is my <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
He <S%H389>only<s%> is my <S%H6697>rock<s%> and my <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> My <S%H4869>stronghold;<s%> I shall not be <S%H7227>greatly<s%> <S%H4131>shaken.<s%>

<S%H575>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will you <S%H9095>assail<s%> a <S%H376>man,<s%> That you may <S%H7523>murder<s%> [him,] <S%H3605>all<s%> of you, Like a <S%H5186>leaning<s%> <S%H1447>wall,<s%> like a <S%H1760>tottering<s%> <S%H1447>fence<s%>?

They have <S%H3289>counseled<s%> <S%H389>only<s%> to <S%H5080>thrust<s%> him <S%H5080>down<s%> from his <S%H7613>high<s%> <S%H7613>position;<s%> They <S%H7521>delight<s%> in <S%H3577>falsehood;<s%> They <S%H1288>bless<s%> with their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> But <S%H7130>inwardly<s%> they <S%H7043>curse.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H1826>wait<s%> in <S%H1826>silence<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H389>only,<s%> For my <S%H8615>hope<s%> is from Him.
He <S%H389>only<s%> is my <S%H6697>rock<s%> and my <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> My <S%H4869>stronghold;<s%> I shall not be <S%H4131>shaken.<s%>
On <S%H430>God<s%> my <S%H3468>salvation<s%> and my <S%H9202>glory<s%> [rest]; The <S%H6697>rock<s%> of my <S%H5797>strength,<s%> my <S%H4268>refuge<s%> is in <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H982>Trust<s%> in Him at <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6256>times,<s%> O <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H8210>Pour<s%> out your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Him; <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H4268>refuge<s%> for us. <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H1121>Men<s%> <S%H120><s%> of <S%H1121>low<s%> <S%H120><s%> <S%H1121>degree<s%> <S%H120><s%> are <S%H389>only<s%> <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> and <S%H1121>men<s%> <S%H376><s%> of <S%H376>rank<s%> are a <S%H3577>lie;<s%> In the <S%H3976>balances<s%> they <S%H5927>go<s%> up; They are <S%H3162>together<s%> lighter <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H1892>breath.<s%>

Do not <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H6233>oppression,<s%> And do not <S%H1891>vainly<s%> <S%H1891>hope<s%> in <S%H1498>robbery;<s%> <S%H3588>If<s%> <S%H2428>riches<s%> <S%H5107>increase,<s%> do not <S%H7896>set<s%> [your] <S%H3820>heart<s%> [upon them.]
<S%H259>Once<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken;<s%> <S%H8147>Twice<s%> I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H2098>this:<s%> That <S%H5797>power<s%> belongs to <S%H430>God;<s%>
And <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is Thine, O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> For Thou dost <S%H9608>recompense<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> according to his <S%H4639>work.<s%>
